name: Death Trap
text:
You may remove a friendly minion in raidus.
One enemy hero in radius, who is adjacent to an empty minion spawn point in the battle zone, discards a card, if able.

name: Dread Razor
text:
+1 ::range:: Range if you are adjacent to an empty minion spawn point in the battle zone.
Target a unit in range.

name: Rusty Razor
text:
+1 ::range:: Range if you are adjacent to an empty minion spawn point in the battle zone.
Target a unit in range.

name: Littlefinger of Death
text:
Target a unit in range.
+2 ::attack:: Attack if you target a hero with a card in the discard.

name: Finger of Death
text:
Target a unit in range.
+3 ::attack:: Attack if you target a hero with a card in the discard.

name: Middlefinger of Death
text:
Target a unit in range.
+3 ::attack:: Attack if you target a hero with a card in the discard.

name: Burning Skull
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: Push every enemy unit adjacent to the target 1 space away from the target's space.

name: Blazing Skull
text:
Target a unit in range.
Before the attack: Push every enemy unit adjacent to the target 1 space away from the target's space.

name: Dark Ritual
text:
You may remove a friendly minion in radius. If there are 3 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone, gain 1 coin.
_(Removing the minion is optional!)_

name: Darker Ritual
text: You may remove a friendly minion in radius. If there are 3 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins.

name: Darkest Ritual
text: You may remove a friendly minion in radius. If there are 3 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins, and you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Necromancy
text: If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, respawn a friendly minion in a spawn point adjacent to you in the battle zone.

name: Necromastery
text: If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, respawn a friendly minion in a spawn point in radius in the battle zone.

name: Shield of Decay
text: +3 ::defense:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty minion spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

name: Vampiric Shield
text:
You may remove a friendly minion in radius.
+3 ::defense:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty minion spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

name: Aegis of Doom
text:
You may remove a friendly minion in radius.
If there are 2 or more empty minion spawn points in radius in the battle zone: +4 ::defense:: Defense and **This turn:** You are immune.

name: Drain Essence
text: Perform a non-attack action of a card in the discard of an enemy hero in radius; apply no item bonuses.

name: Soul Siphon
text: Perform an action of a card in the discard of an enemy hero in radius; apply no item bonuses.

name: Tide of Darkness
text: Whenever you perform an action, all spaces count as if they are in the battle zone and have a minion spawn point.
